welcome_message.help: The message that sends when a user joins your server, only works if 'welcome_message_channel' is set.

welcome_message_channel.help: The channel that receives a message when a user joins your server.

allow_invites_channel.help: The channel(s) that invites are allowed in.

prefix.help:
The prefix the bot will use in this server,
False means use default ($), and string means custom prefix (duh).

birthday_announcement_channel.help: The channel that receives a message when it's a users birthday.

birthday_announcement_message.help: The message that sends when it's a users birthday, only works if 'birthday_announcement_channel' is set.

birthday_role.help: The role that members get if it's their birthday.

qotd_channel.help: The channel that question of the day questions are posted.

qotd_role.help: The role that gets pinged when a new qotd is posted.

replybot_channel.help: The channel(s) that allows AidanBot to reply to people [BETA].
